ext.description: A fast and powerful image uploading plugin for VSCode based on PicGo. Supports most image types (png, jpg, gif, etc.) and many image hosting services (smms, qiniu, imgur, etc.)!
command.upload.updateSetting.title: Update PicGo Setting
command.upload.clipboard.title: Upload from clipboard
command.upload.explorer.title: Upload from explorer
command.upload.inputBox.title: Upload from input box
command.webview.demo.title: Open demo page
command.webview.picGoControlPanel.title: Open PicGo Control Panel
config.title: PicGo-Minio
config.configPath.description: The path to your PicGo-Core configuration. PicGo will use `#picgo.picBed#` if this is not specified. Please see [PicGo-Core Docs](https://picgo.github.io/PicGo-Core-Doc/zh/guide/config.html#%E9%BB%98%E8%AE%A4%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE%E6%96%87%E4%BB%B6) and [PicGo Docs](https://picgo.github.io/PicGo-Doc/zh/guide/config.html#%E5%9B%BE%E5%BA%8A%E5%8C%BA) for more detail about configuration file.
config.dataPath.description: The path to your data file, including all uploaded images' info. PicGo will use `your_home_dir/vs-picgo-data.json` if this is not specified.
config.customUploadName.description:
Customize the name of the image to be uploaded, image will be renamed before uploading.
- `${fileName}`: the name of the original image, without extension name.
 **Notice: If you selected some text before uploading, the selection will become the `fileName` of the image to be uploaded.**
- `${extName}`: the extension name of the original image.
- `${mdFileName}`: the name of the current editing markdown file.
- `${date}`: YY-MM-DD formatted date.
- `${dateTime}`: YY-MM-DD-hh-mm-ss formatted date.

Examples:
- `${fileName}-${date}${extName}` -> `picName-2016-07-25.jpg`
- `${mdFileName}`-`${dateTime}${extName}` -> `markdownName-2017-04-12-22-28-10.jpg`
config.customOutputFormat.description: Customize the output format of the uploaded image. - `${url}`: the url of the uploaded image. - `${uploadedName}`: the name of the uploaded image without extension name, see `#picgo.customUploadName#`, note that even if you used `${extName}` in `#picgo.customUploadName#`, there still will be no extension name in the output. Examples: - `![${uploadedName}](${url})` -> `![picName-2016-07-25](https://example.com/xxx.jpg)` - `` -> ``
config.picBed.proxy: Proxy for `request`, see [`picBed.proxy`](https://picgo.github.io/PicGo-Core-Doc/zh/guide/config.html#picbed-proxy) for more detail.
config.picBed.gitlab.path.description: img path in response json (eg:url or data.url)
config.picBed.minio.subdir.description: 存储桶里的子目录，默认'',示例：aa/bb/,注意开始没有/，结尾有/
config.picBed.minio.port.description: TCP/IP端口号。可选，默认值是，如果是http,则默认80端口，如果是https,则默认是443端口
config.picBed.minio.accessKey.descriptio: accessKey类似于用户ID，用于唯一标识你的账户
config.picBed.minio.useSSL.description: 如果是true，则用的是https而不是http,默认值是true
config.picBed.minio.region.description: 设置该值以覆盖自动发现存储桶region。（可选）
config.picBed.minio.transport.descriptio: 将此值设置为在自定义传输中传递。(可选)
config.picBed.minio.sessionToken.descrip: 设置此值以提供x-amz-security-token(特定于AWS S3)。(可选)
config.picBed.minio.partSize.description: 设置此值以覆盖多部分上传的默认部分大小64MB
